title: Apple releases watchOS 8.6 beta 1 to developers
content:
A few weeks after releasing watchOS 8.5, Apple is seeding watchOS 8.6 beta 1 to all developers. Here’s everything we know so far about this upcoming update, which could be the latest before watchOS 9, set to be introduced during WWDC 2022.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.6 beta 1 to developers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
